data.title: ריכזנו עבורכם 8 משרות בחברות שגדלות ומגייסות עובדים, ולכולן יש עמוד ב-Geektime Insider כדי שתוכלו לקבל הצצה לעבודה היומיומית בהן

paragraphs.context: Trax is looking for an IT & Support Specialist to join its team. This person will be responsible to provide global IT & Support assistance and be a focal point to our regional offices. Assisting with training and creating our global NOC team. The ideal candidate will be able to work under pressure and with tight SLAs to provide excellent service. He or she is expected to be an autodidact and a fast learner to provide technical assistance within the temporary time.
